ai-thig2.2:1.2_0: for realizing the path that leads to extinguishment.
ai-thig2.2:1.4_0: as it was taught by the Buddha:
ai-thig2.2:2.1_0: For I have seen the Blessed One,
ai-thig2.2:2.2_0: this bag of bones is their last.
ai-thig2.2:2.4_0: now there’ll be no more future lives.”
ai-thig2.2:3.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior nun Visākha.
